content: My observations of FHIR Connectathon 14, given I was absent for the past year the change was dramatic.. https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2017/01/fhir-connectathon-has-changed-and-it-is.html
Agree! We can say that over the last year we've seen the number of new people joining the connectathon increase and the depth of the solutions as well.

Wish I had been able to make it! You all are doing great work and I finally have some time to start paying close attention. Who knows, maybe I'll actually find a place to help out and write some code =)
